title: talkoncrypto Official
author: talkoncrypto Official
created_time: November 11, 2022, 09:27:55 AMLast edit: November 11, 2022, 01:17:39 PM by talkoncrypto Official
content: Pic Courtesy Coinbaazar Team Bitcoin22 Miami ConferenceAfter Watching the Pic Above.. What are the things that comes to your mind about Bitcoin..1) Hope for future2) Trust in decentralization3) Financial Freedom4) Reminds you that Bitcoin is mother of all Altcoins5) Life Changing Moments or Earning6) You feel privilege/proud/honored to be part Community, whose believes are same as yours7) Massive Bitcoin Conferences all over the world ... The Blockchain, The Genius Brain of Satoshi Nakamoto, The technology/code/21 millionAnything else which you have felt , share it  ..

comments.author: talkoncrypto Official
comments.body: What's up with Bitcoin Price this year End

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I'm not sure how the image relates to the Bitcoin bull. A picture will neither push nor indicate Bitcoin. To say the least least, I'm not finding anything related to bull runs. However, we know that history repeats itself. So, despite a lot of bad news, there are many reasons to believe that Bitcoin will recover in the near future. Just keep in mind that we are now struggling with a massive bear eight. It would take some time to recover, and the picture is meaningless.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on November 26, 2022, 06:12:25 PMI'm not sure how the image relates to the Bitcoin bull. A picture will neither push nor indicate Bitcoin. To say the least least, I'm not finding anything related to bull runs. However, we know that history repeats itself. So, despite a lot of bad news, there are many reasons to believe that Bitcoin will recover in the near future. Just keep in mind that we are now struggling with a massive bear eight. It would take some time to recover, and the picture is meaningless.Exactly, there is no correlation, but I guess there are still individual and it's the majority here that bitcoin bull run will happen later, right after the halving.So I this same people could be looking forward for the next bull run despite what is the current price that we are experiencing. And with that, for me this picture is taken perhaps just a souvenir for this young people that they have attended the conference in 2022, simply as that.Again, bitcoin will continue regardless of what we are experiencing right now.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Bright futures that's what come to my mind when I saw that picture Quote from: talkoncrypto Official on November 26, 2022, 06:06:39 AMWhat's up with Bitcoin Price this year's EndWith what happened to FTX and its domino effect in the industry I'm not very optimistic, but next year things will be better and we will shrug off the many bad things that have happened to us this year, there are a lot of great things that also happened this year but it was also eclipsed by the FTX, time and again the saying, not your keys not your coins is still and always true.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on November 26, 2022, 06:12:25 PMI'm not sure how the image relates to the Bitcoin bull. A picture will neither push nor indicate Bitcoin. To say the least least, I'm not finding anything related to bull runs. However, we know that history repeats itself. So, despite a lot of bad news, there are many reasons to believe that Bitcoin will recover in the near future. Just keep in mind that we are now struggling with a massive bear eight. It would take some time to recover, and the picture is meaningless.Images has the tendency of meaning or insinuating different thing to different people. An image might mean a lot to me, while it is meaningless to someone else. Maybe the statue of the bull behind the people in the picture gives the writer the needed motivation that there is better days is ahead. I don't also see the connection between the picture and the bitcoin market. I am viewing it as an image that was used to beautify the bitcoin conference venue.   Every true believer of bitcoin understands that this bearish run will not last forever. Which means that there is need for patience and perseverance. The brave in the bitcoin industry are buying and hodling because the bullish run would definitely come.
